summary:
• Expert in performing analysis, data collection and evaluation, resource optimisation, methods development, as well as research and interpretation of scientific findings; highly skilled in deploying diverse experimental methods and cutting-edge technologies.
• Proficient in working with scientific equipment, equipped with thorough knowledge of all research-based duties including sampling, testing, measuring, recording, and analysing results.
• Familiar with theoretical models of the early Universe, extensions of the Standard Model and other topics revolving around Nuclear and High Energy Physics through constant discussion and sharing with people of profound knowledge in the area.
• Demonstrates a proven track record of assuming full responsibilities of varied roles including System Administrator and Programmer and Multi-Executive Specialist equipped with exceptional out-of-the-box thinking, leadership, and teambuilding capabilities.

Key Skills
Analysis, Reporting, Research & Development, Planning and Organisation, Systems Administration, IT Management and Operations, Science, Physics, New Technologies Production and Commercialisation, Nuclear Physics, High Energy Physics

Other achievements:
• Development and implementation of web-based for monitoring, analysis and optimization of online sales for the dealer boats, motors and equipment for extreme forms of recreation;
• Successful presentation and publication of research results in the collection of reports for the 16th international conference on physics of elementary particles "What Comes Beyond Standard Model" ( Scientific Committee : John Ellis (CERN), David Gross (KITP) and Roman Jackiw (MIT)) held in Bled (Slovenia)
• Knowledge of market for boats and outboard motors small class

Adept in utilising Microsoft Office Suite, LibreOffice, Adobe Photoshop, LaTeX, LyX, ROOT, Maple, Wolfram Mathematica, Pythia, CompHEP, CERN CMS & Atlas Software, C/C++, Assembler, Python, PHP, and a wide array of operating systems

school.name: National Research Nuclear University (former Moscow Engineering Physics Institute)
National Research Nuclear University (former Moscow Engineering Physics Institute)

profile_positions.description:
Handle the deployment, monitoring, maintenance, development, upgrade and support of all IT systems including servers, PCs, operating systems, software applications, and peripherals.
Manage system development and enhancement as well as the integration of new systems with existing systems.
Involved in the development and implementation of standard operating procedures and best practices including all IT protocols and guidance to all staff and end-users.
Lead all IT staff including the hiring, training, development, and evaluation as well as the provision of end-user services such as help desk and technical support services.
Ensure the delivery of quality IT services to all end-users while complying with all enforced policies and procedures.
Keep up-to-date with the latest technologies in order to meet all business and system requirements through the use of new technology solutions and implementations.
profile_positions.title: Head of IT

profile_positions.description:
• Developed and maintained IT strategies by effectively managing staff as well as researching, testing, and implementing technological strategic solutions.
• Ensured the maintenance of the organisation’s effectiveness by defining and supporting strategic plans.
• Oversaw all information technology strategies, policies, and procedures by evaluating organisation outcomes, identifying problems, evaluating trends, and anticipating requirements.
• Communicated regularly with the staff and end-users to discuss a wide array of information services and systems.
profile_positions.title: IT Manager

profile_positions.description:
• Managed the effective provisioning, installation, configuration, operation, and maintenance of all systems hardware, software, and related infrastructure.
• Took part in technical research and development to enable continuing innovation within the company’s infrastructure.
• Provided first-rate assistance to personnel and teams in dealing with technical issues and handling all planning phases of all IT projects which included research, technical analysis and design, testing, and implementation.
• Conducted other IT duties such as handling daily system monitoring, verifying hardware and system availability and integrity, reviewing system and application logs, and complying with all IT guidelines and procedures.
profile_positions.title: System Administrator

profile_positions.description: Participation in the research work of the High Energy Physics Chair on the grant of the Ministry of Education and Science of the Russian Federation.
